info.name: LaPlateforme_ SOCIAL NETWORK API
info.description: LaPlateforme Social Network API is an interface to communicate with LaPlateforme Social Network backend and perform CRUD operations on the different ressources available and exposed through this API.

item.name: posts

request.description: Create a post in database for the current_user (user who is currently logged in)
Show the details of a post user must be logged in
Show the details of a post user must be logged in
Update the details of a post user must be logged in and author of the targeted post
Update the details of a post user must be logged in and author of the targeted post (user credential are not correct or user is not the author of the ressource)
Update the details of a post user must be logged in and author of the targeted post (wrong parameters)
Delete a post. User must be logged in and author of the targeted post (user credential are not correct or user is not the author of the ressource)

item.description: La Plateforme SOCIAL NETWORK API is an interface to perform CRUD operations on ressources exposed through the API. Most of of the operations necessitate the user to be logged in and send signed request using JWT token avaialable in headers.
